issue.title: [CF 1464] Stacks of Dire Beast - How to Display
issue.body:
Hello,

 

I'd like to display how many stacks of Dire Beast are active at any given moment. I'm not sure how to do this. I'm able to show the icon when a Dire Beast is active, and even show a zero in the middle of the icon. But i'm not able to show how many stacks are currently live.

 

I've explored a few option and messed around, but have gotten nowhere. 

 

Any help would great!

 

Thank you


> Posted by CurseForge user jaikusif | Imported from CurseForge issue #1464 | Raw

comments.body:
You can make a controller group that will show an icon for each active dire beast you have.

 

``` ^1^T^SGUID^STMW:group:1QmNHEdlyDKv ^SIcons^T ^N1^T ^SShowTimer^B ^SType^Sbuff ^SName^SDire~`Beast ^SShowTimerText^B ^SStates^T ^N1^T ^t^N3^T ^t^N4^T ^t^t^SEnabled^B ^t^N2^T ^SStates^T ^N1^T ^t^N3^T ^t^N4^T ^t^t^t^N3^T ^SStates^T ^N1^T ^t^N3^T ^t^N4^T ^t^t^t^N4^T ^SStates^T ^N1^T ^t^N3^T ^t^N4^T ^t^t^t^t^SControlled^B ^t^N84305^S~`~| ^Sgroup^N18 ^^ ```

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
